TopicTitle: Request: Don't render the cockpit unless you're in it.

Articles.Content:
I recently noticed that if I go on EVA, the entire game runs amazingly smoothly. But the moment I get back in the spacecraft, the lags and crashes come back. I asked on Reddit why this might be, and someone suggested maybe it's because of the cockpit view?

So I'd like to know if something exists, or can be made, to stop the game from rendering the cockpit while not playing from inside it.

When you get out of the craft isn't it just space junk then ? And when you return then it's a don't know how to say this but a craft again and if you are getting crashes you are overloaded or have some bugs in the mods you are using have you checked your log ?
Log says mono.dll. I'm aware that happens with too many mods, but my mods + squad are less than 1 gb so I don't see why it would be so laggy and crashing.
